titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Forensic Mental Health Service - Description

div.p: A Forensic Mental Health Service is a type of Mental Health Service.
A Forensic Mental Health Service is a specialist SERVICE for people who have a mental health problem who have been arrested, who are on remand or who have been to court and found guilty of a crime.
A Forensic Mental Health Service is an alternative to Prison for people who have a mental health problem and offers specialist mental health treatment and care.
